ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 40 dataflow units x 1000 INT4 ops/unit/clock = 40,000 INT4 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 40 dataflow units x 500 INT8 ops/unit/clock = 20,000 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: Transformer-optimized dataflow with KV cache support. External LPDDR4X for model weights.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1000 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: 40 TOPS INT4, 20 TOPS INT8 @ 2.5W. First edge Gen AI accelerator with KV cache for LLMs. 16nm TSMC. 4-8GB LPDDR4X for model weights. Supports 2B parameter LLMs (Phi-2, TinyLLaMA). Production 2026.
